text: , was a Japanese actress.. In 1947, she made her debut as one of the lead actresses in an omnibus movie . Kuga is known for her roles in Drunken Angel (1948), The Idiot (1951), Older Brother, Younger Sister (1953), The Woman in the Rumor (1954), Equinox Flower (1958), Good Morning (1959), Cruel Story of Youth (1960), Zero Focus (1961), The Story of Osaka Castle (1961) as Kobue and Toki o Kakeru Shōjo (1997). Kuga was married to actor Akihiko Hirata from 1961 until his death in 1984.
